duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and test advanced Power Systems Application software, delivering and maintaining assigned functions.
Work on machine, cloud, platform, and/or application areas related to Power Systems Applications.
Program features, contribute to the team, work independently, and act as a member of the Software Center of Excellence.

Implement new functionalities in power system application software and apply SDLC and methodologies like Lean/Agile/XP, CI, Software and Product Security, Scalability, Documentation Practices, Refactoring and Testing Techniques.
Maintain power systems application functionality including code fixes, documentation, and user interfaces.
Collaborate with system engineers, frontend developers, and software developers to implement solutions aligned with shared platforms.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field with thesis work in Electrical Engineering or power systems. Some experience in power systems and/or synchrophasor applications, software development, and Agile environment.
